title: Triage and Classification of spinal disorder

Is there a history of cancer in the past.title: Is there a history of cancer in the past 5 years or other red flags like unexplained weight loss?

Is there a history of or suspected serio.title: Is there a history of or suspected serious neurological disease?

Is there a history suggesting that sympt.title: Is there a history suggesting that symptoms originate from a non-spinal pathology (ie: visceral pathology such as kidney stone, angina, etc)?

enum: Yes ; appear stable or not causing pain.

Does the person have a significant spina.title: Does the person have a significant spinal deformity, scoliosis or kyphosis?
